scripts.deploy-iexec-mainnet: graph deploy iexecblockchaincomputing/iexec-poco-v5         --node http://thegraph.iex.ec:8020      --ipfs http://thegraph.iex.ec:5001    subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy-thegraph-mainnet: graph deploy iexecblockchaincomputing/iexec-poco-v5         --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.create-iexec: npm run create-iexec-mainnet    && npm run create-iexec-rinkeby    && npm run create-iexec-goerli
scripts.deploy-iexec: npm run deploy-iexec-mainnet    && npm run deploy-iexec-rinkeby    && npm run deploy-iexec-goerli
scripts.deploy-thegraph: npm run deploy-thegraph-mainnet && npm run deploy-thegraph-rinkeby && npm run deploy-thegraph-goerli
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-thegraph && npm run deploy-iexec
